title: Excellent Christmas Story!!
review:
I dont know why only 3 stars on this???
I rate it 10 stars!! Excellent story!! Excellent acting!! Had a few twists and turns to give it lots of interest!! And It was about helping your fellow neighbor !! It isnt always about the rules or laws!!
Great movie for family viewing too!!!

review: A wonderful, touching film about trust, faith and caring...

title: Sappy and sweet
review:
The story is a bit clumsy in spots. It gets sappy but that's expected.

The acting could be worse and could be better. The transition from antagonism to romance is too quick and doesn't really make sense.

The ending is sweet.
